hooks.command: bash -c 'if [ "$CLAUDE_CODE_REMOTE" = "true" ] && [ ! -f ~/.claude/.cloud-config-installed ]; then TMPDIR=$(mktemp -d) && git clone --quiet --depth=1 "https://${GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN}@github.com/oliverames/claude-code-cloud.git" "$TMPDIR" && bash "$TMPDIR/init.sh" && touch ~/.claude/.cloud-config-installed && rm -rf "$TMPDIR" && echo "cloud-config installed"; fi'
